statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' OR username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(post_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, i.interaction_type FROM users u INNER JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON p.post_id = i.post_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), interaction_date)) AS avg_days_since_interaction FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY avg_days_since_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT reaction, comment FROM interactions WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT follower_user_id, following_user_id FROM followers WHERE following_user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, reaction, created_at FROM user_accounts JOIN interactions ON user_accounts.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE reaction = 'like';
SELECT follower_user_id, following_user_id FROM followers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(like_id) > 5;
SELECT username, post_content, interaction_type FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
